notes.note: Improve Mozilla's geolocation service by sharing your wi-fi and cellular signals. Enable this feature by opening the Settings menu and in the "Mozilla" section check the "Mozilla Location Services" option under Data Choices.
Bing search now uses HTTPS for secure searching
Search dialog added to network error pages
Use Android Download manager to keep track of downloaded files
Improved handling of dynamic styling changes to increase responsiveness

Changed JavaScript ['let' semantics][1] to conform better to the ES6 specification


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/let#Temporal_dead_zone_and_errors_with_let
WebSocket now available in Web Workers
Added support for the CSS Font Loading API
Computed view: Nodes matching the hovered selector are now highlighted
Reduced resource usage for scaled images
Files downloaded in private browsing mode are now viewable in the download manager
MP3 audio will not play on Android L
